price: 101. Loba: Bótala nini ezali na likolo na mabele. Kasi bilembo ya bokamwisi mpe na bakebisi,(1) bakokaki te kosalisa bato bazanga kondima.
arabic: قُلِ ٱنظُرُواْ مَاذَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَا تُغۡنِي ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ وَٱلنُّذُرُ عَن قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: quli unẓurū mādhā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā tugh'nī al-āyātu wal-nudhuru ʿan qawmin lā yu'minūna
